rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Accessible entrance with ramps for wheelchair users. Provides a welcoming space leading to the open plan kitchen and living area.

rooms.name: Open Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Large open-plan space combining a modern kitchen with an adjacent living area. Features wheelchair accessible counters and seating areas.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible guest toilet ensuring privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Garage (Connected to Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated with ground floor for easy access. Includes space for storage and wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Contains utility rooms and a small pantry to support the kitchen, designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, accessible door with a ramp leading into the cottage. Designed to facilitate easy wheelchair access.

openings.name: Window Alcoves
openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring ample natural light and enhancing the open plan living area.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Roll-up door with easy access for vehicles, integrated with the garage space.
